Text: Is it a Intel compatible distro & bootable ?
Yes, 100% Intel compatible & bootable. Exact distro sitting in the app store.
can we install this on a PC using UniBeast etc etc?

Installed yesterday, everything working great! 
Thanks a lot!

@madz679 - I'm not sure if this is a workable solution for a PC utilizing UniBeast or not. My intention is simply to make available the same .dmg image in the App store, only small enough to fit on a single 4.7GB DVD should you decide to burn it.

what about the update stuff? did this pass trought the verification process if there is one?
im noob about mac os.

tks in advance.

There is no verification or activation process with OS X. Just install it, update it, and you're fine.
But, if you're doing a Hackintosh that's a different story.
